dict.string: Tap on the screen to jump. First player moves the slowest (wind restriction) while last one the fastest
Want to know how to play, right?
You just caught Power Up! There are 3 types of powerups
Shoot rocket at players behind you to slow them down
Wear a ghost robe and run through other players
To activate press button on the bottom gateCollectorTut
You're playing "Gate Collector" mode. Collect most gates to win
You're playing "anything but last" mode. Reach gate last and you loose!
You're playing "Elimintion" mode.Each gate last player is eliminated and the game goes on
Collect as many gates as possible without reaching any gate last
Press the button which color is the same as your character
You can also touch anywhere over the button
Play carrer first on disable tutorials in Options
